name: Lemony Chickpea Salad
description: The nutty flavour and buttery texture of chickpeas make this salad both satisfying and nutritious.

ingredients.name: Greek Dressing Mix, or Spinach Dip Mix
small red or green bell pepper

preparation: Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice and dressing mix in a mixing bowl.
Add chickpea, peppers, onions, and radish, tossing to coat. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve at room temperature.
tips: Lighten up! Try using only 2 tbsp oil and add 1 additional tbsp lemon juice – you’ll save 70 calories, and 7 g fat (1 g saturated) per serving!

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Spinach Dip Mix
summary: Punchy blend with onion & sweet bell pepper.
